messages.content: Hello, My family live in Hamble and our children go to school and nursery in Bursledon. I've run a business for twenty years so I am new to politics. I only got involved when I heard local politicians say one thing, make promises, then do another act differently.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An NHS with the time to care, Labour pledge 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 extra GPs.
Immigration is important, but to be fair Labour will ask for two years contributions before any benefit claim.
We will balance the books. Labour's plan will reduce the deficit in the next Parliament.
Will freeze Business Rates at 2014 levels saving 1.5 million small firms up to £2,000.
Young people bear the brunt of austerity. Labour will bring in Technical Degrees, longer-term tenancies, fairer tuition fees.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In this election the share of the popular vote will count as never before it could decide who governs us.

issues.economy: In hard times we must still look after the most vulnerable, to balance the books we need real growth for all, and immigration has to be controlled fairly.
issues.education: Young people bear the brunt of austerity. Labour will bring in Technical Degrees, longer-term tenancies, fairer tuition fees.
issues.health: An NHS with the time to care, Labour pledge 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 extra GPs.
issues.immigration: Immigration is important, but to be fair Labour will ask for two years contributions before any benefit claim.

housing.content: Labour will bring in ... longer-term tenancies...

leaflet.personalStatement: Hello, My family live in Hamble and our children go to school and nursery in Bursledon. I've run a business for twenty years so I am new to politics. I only got involved when I heard local politicians say one thing, make promises, then do another act differently.

images.caption: We will build an NHS with the time to care. We will control immigration with fair rules.
